# datePickerStyle

**Instance Property**

The date picker style to use.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var datePickerStyle: NSDatePicker.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDatePicker/Style].

## Configuring Appearance

- **backgroundColor**: The cell’s background color.
- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell draws its background.
- **textColor**: The cell’s text color.
- **datePickerElements**: A bitmask that indicates which visual elements are shown by the date picker.
